name: Blue Light (NEVERMIND STUDIOS)
description:
WHAT IS THIS GAME?

This game is about a BLUE LIGHT lurking and exploring the darkness, and trying to know where is the END.....

Note : THIS IS MY FIRST GODOT PROJECT  /  GAME so please support my games by downloading it so i can make more better games.

WHERE IS IT AVAILABLE ?

THIS GAME IS ONLY AVAILABLE FOR PC NOT FOR ANDROID  because i am still learning the game engine and its fundementals,.
